name: Spinning Around [LD47]
description:
This my Ludum Dare 47 entry and it was the first time I've participated in a game jam. At first I was thinking to collaborate with someone, but after some time I decided to make a game solo.

The theme of the jam is "stuck in a loop", so I brainstormed a bit and all Ideas was about how we stuck in our day routines. I thought these ideas are too complicated and I don't like too complicated things I like simple ones. So, I always wanted to make a hyper casual game and I decided that the jam is a great opportunity to do this. 

So I made a very simple game where you fly around an orbit (loop) and avoid obstacles.
